item.title: Heaven Missing
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → Should auld acquaintance be forgot And never brought to mind? Should auld acquaintance be forgot And days of auld lang syne? For auld lang syne, my dear For auld lang syne We'll tak a cup o' kindness yet

item.title: Old Games
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → 𝕯𝖊𝖉𝖎𝖈𝖆𝖙𝖊𝖉 𝖙𝖔 𝖙𝖍𝖊 𝖜𝖆𝖗𝖒-𝖇𝖑𝖔𝖔𝖉𝖊𝖉 𝖆𝖓𝖎𝖒𝖆𝖑𝖘 𝖔𝖋 𝖙𝖍𝖊 𝖜𝖔𝖗𝖑𝖉 The unique value of the “authentic” work of art has its basis in ritual, the location of its original use value. But the instant the criterion of authenticity ceases to be applicable to artistic production, the total function of art is reversed.

item.title: It Ain't No Big Thing (But It's Growing)

The Cotton Club Peggy Sue Got Married Zandalee Never On Tuesday It Could Happen To You Amos and Andrew The Rock Face/Off all starring Nicolas Cage I'm standing in line at the Silverlake Gelson's.

item.title: Dontcha Think It's Time
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → June & July 2020 The police exist to keep us safe, or so we are told by mainstream media and popular culture. TV shows exaggerate the amount of serious crime and the nature of what most police officers actually do all day. Crime control is a small part of policing, and it always has been.

item.title: Anything That's Part Of You
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → ~~~ May 2020 ~~~ Playlist by Seattle-based photographer and macrame artist Melissa Kagerer ~~~ Dreams by Colleen, IMDB research by Mave ~~~ ໒( ♥ ◡ ♥ )७ ~♪ ~~~ ANGELS They have little use. They are best as objects of torment. No government cares what you do with them.

item.title: I Hear A Sweet Voice Calling
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → -- For Alicia Made in the intense LA heat and global emotion of July 2020 This Editors’ Note As Our Editor’s Note `````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````````` Richard Chiem is the author of You Private Person (Sorry House Classics) and the novel King of Joy (Soft Skull Press, 2019).

item.title: Put Your Hand In The Hand

item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → We are here to ruin ourselves and break our hearts and love the wrong people and die ~ Nicolas Cage in Moonstruck With a playlist and recipes from Noël Morical Recipes

item.title: Slowly, As I Leave You
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → ko.yaa.nis.qatsi (from the Hopi language), n. 1. crazy life 2. life in turmoil 3. life disintegrating 4. life out of balance 5. a state of life that calls for another way of living We made this eZine at the start of Gemini Season 2020 (~￣³￣)~ Caroline Belle Stewart is a writer and teacher living in Western MA.

item.title: THIS IS MY HEAVEN
item.description: .cls-1 { fill: #f6f6f6; } ← → Dedicated to Nicolas Cage Poem by Patty Gone April-May 2020 A man is attractive at only two moments In his entire life -- -- -- -- -- One
